name: Alien Blaster!
description:
This is Alien Blaster! A short little game created through Game Maker Studio 2! What Alien Blaster! offers:

- 2 levels with tons of stuff to shoot and each with it's own miniboss
- original pixel art
- intense final boss fight
- cool tunes!

 This is my first attempt at making a game with Game Maker Studio 2. I wanted to create something functional and just get the core ideas of the software. I already have an idea for my next project which is just about to get started. Hope you enjoy!
